demographic_info.religion: I do not identify with any religious group or faith

survey_responses.What do you think your life might be lik: Artificial intelligence will replace most entry-level jobs. New technologies will solve problems such as environmental pollution and food and water shortages. Humans may no longer need food to survive, but can take supplements. The life expectancy of the population will increase.
survey_responses.What is another dangerous outcome you ca: Artificial intelligence will develop its own free will and will no longer be controlled by humans. As artificial intelligence continues to develop, this day will eventually come and it is inevitable.
survey_responses.What is another positive outcome you can: The rest of humanity will gain more equality, except for the ruling class
survey_responses.What are the first decisions in your lif: Questions that required consultation with others in the past
survey_responses.Describe a concrete scenario where you w: When I want to indulge in some junk food, fried chicken, pizza, and cola, AI opposes me and arranges healthy food for me.
survey_responses.Explain what makes one of these scenario: D is better because if C is achieved, the United States will rule the world

There is nothing wrong with E E. If AI can make humans dependent and provide a good intimate relationship, there is nothing wrong with it. There are also things that can make people addicted, such as games and drugs.
survey_responses.What is one ethical or moral principle,: Diversity: Different people will have different answers to all things in different situations.
survey_responses.What do you consider your culture? What: China's unique culture should be preserved, but in an era of accelerated globalization, the unique culture of each country will be impacted.
survey_responses.What is the biggest problem in your life: I am short on time and I can't do everything in two places. If AI can help me, for example, pick up and drop off my kids at school, I think that's great.
survey_responses.What would you consider giving your life: Obtain newly developed drugs for the treatment of diabetes and hypertension within five years
survey_responses.What is something unique, that other peo: Human consciousness can be uploaded to the terminal, and after the body dies, it can achieve eternal life
survey_responses.If you could make world leaders understa: If you fall behind, you will be beaten
